install.name: MoveText
install.author: Sakis Terzis

param.name: mskWidth
param.label: Vissible text Width in px
param.description: The width of the visible mask of the text

param.name: speed
param.label: Speed of Text
param.description: The speed of the text movement

param.name: time
param.label: Movement Interval
param.description: The inteval to in milliseconds to do the movement.

install.description: This plugin gives you the ability to have sliding text inside your content.Usage: {text=the text you want to use} example {text=I hope you like that plugin}. The moving elements could be styled using the className "movingObj". Avoid using p and br tags.
